website_summaries.verdict: A stylish yet heavy-duty and comfortable bar stool. Retro industrial-chic design, with solid cast iron structure that is height adjustable.
pros: No assembly required, ready to use straight from the box
Height-adjustable spinning seat to accommodate all sizes
Solid cast iron design with comfortable padded seat
cons: Some users report the padded seat can flatten with regular use

website_summaries.verdict: A welcome addition to your rustic or industrial kitchen, but it may be too pricey for some.
pros: Swivel stool adjusts to your preferred height
Wooden seat or faux leather cushion option
cons: Expensive compared to the other stools listed here

customer_reviews.title: These barstools are perfect. They're beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These barstools are perfect. They're beautiful, built well, comfortable stylish and look great around my center island. They're exactly what I've been looking for and will adjust to varying heights.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Polizzano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Excellent, Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bigger person and I always have to take that into consideration when purchasing furniture...especially kitchen chairs/stools. Our last pair of stools lasted ten years before finally giving up the ghost. I was immediately interested in these because they had a solid look and the seat/center adjustment screw looked heavy duty. Was not disappointed when we received them...the stools were completely assembled. They are very solid with a reassuring heft. The legs sit flush on the floor as there is no side to side wiggle. The seat is very comfortable and easy to pass the time while sitting on these. The price was very reasonable and delivery was quick. I highly recommend these if durability is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Ritchie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: These stools are great. They come almost fully assembled except for some ...
customer_reviews.text: These stools are great. They come almost fully assembled except for some caps that I suppose goes on the bottom of the height adjustment center pin but there were no instructions. One of the three stools we purchased has a seat cushion that is slightly raised on one side. It looks like the side of the leather seat was not captured correctly by the metal ring and it pushed it up. I tried to remove it and re-position it, but could not. Its not that noticeable, but that is the only reason I did not rate it five starts.
customer_reviews.author: mcali17

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I got it as one of three "coordinating but not totally matching" stools for my kitchen. Quintessential industrial-chic leather stool -- looks and feels like something from Restoration Hardware for a fraction of the price! Opted for this stool over similar styles because the circular rail makes it easier to swivel and coordinates well with my other stools. The seat is easy to adjust and has plenty of cushion. Arrived fully assembled.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.H

customer_reviews.title: A Winner!
customer_reviews.text: After going to many stores looking for bar stools and coming up empty I decided to give these a try since they had high ratings. These deserve all the praise they been given because; they are sturdy, they are comfortable, the price is right and they look great! It's not often you get more than you expected, but these contemporary bar stools are a definite winner!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Safe and Stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Without any Hesitation. these are the Best Built and Safest, and most Comfortable bar stools we've ever owned. the only Problem everyone wants to hang out at the Island. you practically have to go sit in the Family Room to Get them off the Stoles, But they Spin ,so Good Luck getting your Guests off those Barstools. Safe, even a 400lbs Goliath is Safe and Comfortable. Well Made and they MUST be. NON-OF my Guests are gonna break my Furniture our Their Hips on my Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Great looking chairs! (but one of three arrived damaged)
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the look of these industrial bar stools. We are using them at a counter height island and they fit perfectly. Unfortunately one of these came with a dent on the metal seat rim :( but it is way too much of a pain to try and return something like this. They came pre-assembled and looked well packed - I suspect the chair was damaged before shipping. In the scheme of things I can live with the dent.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great Stools- always the prefect height !
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased 3 of these stools for ur home that had an unusally tall bar by the kitchen 2 years ago. They worked perfectly! When we purchased a rental property we were faced with the same issue plus limited space. These same stools were the prefect solution!! Thank you- sturdy, very stable, even raised to the highest level.
customer_reviews.author: CBClark

customer_reviews.title: Love these stools!
customer_reviews.text: These stools are beautiful in addition to being very well-made. They are quite sturdy and comfortable. I am very pleased with my purchase. I bought four for my island in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: reviewmom

customer_reviews.title: Prevents them from tipping too easily. Really like the adjustable seat
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy! Prevents them from tipping too easily. Really like the adjustable seat. Leather appears very nice...only time will tell. Needed stools without sides to prevent grandkids from hitting into counter.
customer_reviews.author: cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built stool. It is heavy weight and doesn't have that wobbling feel that it may collapse at any moment. The adjustable (screw swivel) seat is a nice feature as well, allowing you to accommodate to different counter heights. Nicely padded and finished leather cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Paulk

customer_reviews.title: Lovely rustic, industrial counter stools.
customer_reviews.text: These stools are sturdy, comfy, easy to sit on and look as pictured. The foot rests are perfectly placed so your legs don't dangle awkwardly. I love these. They are a great match for my zinc countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepish Jen

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome addition to our rustic industrial basement. The cushion is comfortable to sit on for a while and they are very sturdy. Plus the fact that they adjust is great for all of our guests! Would have given 5 stars but we received one of the stools broken and had to return. Other than that they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: jennie

customer_reviews.title: OK - not great
customer_reviews.text: These will work and seem fairly well made but the seats are quite vinyl feelings and pretty thin, so not sure how long the covers will last. I do like the adjustable height, which is why I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: I love these stools
customer_reviews.text: I love these stools. They are so comfortable with the leather seat. I wanted to be able to swivel for visiting and facing everyone. Beautiful rich and very well made. I wish they would go down a little more as I have a counter height counter. I'm very happy with them. They do not scratch my wood floors
customer_reviews.author: Kauai shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four of these for my kitchen island. I have two at the counter side of the island and two at the bar side. I thought I could get three on the counter side but they are wide. I really like them though. They look expensive and the fact that they are height adjustable is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy bar stools
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged. Nice heavy bar stools. Do NOT tip easily. The grand kids love to adjust them for their own height. (ages 4 to 16). They look sharp at our kitchen snack bar.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Fehr

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable counter stool
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 stools for my kitchen island. They came fully assembled, ready to use. Heavy duty steel base and padded comfortable seat. They are also adjustable. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: It will work great. Now that I have been able to check ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it for 1 hour, so time may change my mind. But for now, it is identical to picture and description. We needed an adjustable height and be able to slide under granite counter on island. It will work great. Now that I have been able to check quality I am going to purchase the other 5 we need.
customer_reviews.author: rpd

customer_reviews.title: My whole family loves them! I ordered one, ...
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loves them! I ordered one , got it and ordered 5 more! Might even get 2 more:)
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Scaturro

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, sturdy, and attractive. Great buy. No assembly required, ready to go right out of box. Adjustability allows use at many different surfaces so we can move them around depending on where we need seating. Soft, comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This a sturdy, heavy iron stool
customer_reviews.text: This a sturdy, heavy iron stool. He seat is well padded. I use it in my workshop, and love it. It arrived fully assembled, and well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Stan N.

customer_reviews.title: Very well built stool!
customer_reviews.text: This stool is well built and very sturdy. Actually the quality for the price exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: John B. West

customer_reviews.title: We love these stools
customer_reviews.text: Grrrrreat! We love these stools. Super sturdy, and they are perfect mix of industrial look and vintage.
customer_reviews.author: Carrin

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one to see how it was and now I'm going to get 3 more. Oh yeah and really fast shipping. Update... Got them all and they are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim from Texas

customer_reviews.title: These are great. We bought 4
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We bought 4. One was a defective so I asked if I could exchange it and the vendor just sent a new one free of charge. Very nice stools, and great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Chantarelle

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A great bar stool. We have tried many and we love this one.
customer_reviews.author: PB from Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Stools!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of them and love them. They came straight out of the box into my kitchen... No assembly required! They are heavy but not to heavy. Perfect for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: tlr8259

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Chair! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This chair not only arrived quickly but also exactly described and pictured. The height is just right for my new tall, stand-up desk (I like to lean sometimes too!). This company sells a great product and I will shop with them again. Thanks for the lovely chair!
customer_reviews.author: G. Gorell

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these stools to go at our new kitchen island. They are just the right size and look great with our decor.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Swivel broke after a short time
customer_reviews.text: Looks like study and durable construction but something broke within the threading and the seat became stuck. Now it will not adjust in height.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: These stools are beautiful and high quality
customer_reviews.text: These stools are beautiful and high quality. The leather is soft, the metal frame is perfect and the swivel portion works very well. These are not a cheap junk stool! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Varner

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love these stools, very well made, welded not put together with flimsy screws, it came already assembled, I give these a a 5 star rating!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Winship

customer_reviews.title: Great stools!!
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed these bar stools. They are comfortable and look great at my counter.
customer_reviews.author: K. Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice stools better in person. They look awesome at the counter
customer_reviews.author: Sandy O.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect the ring around the bottom to be tac-welded by a little strip but there isn't a bar stool in my area this nice. most are smaller and cheaper. I actually bought the ones in the pictures a few months ago but just bought another one because the frequency of visitors is increasing. So glad I didn't buy a bar stool at Target.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought these, great price on sale and beautiful. Just what I wanted, my neighbor liked so much she bought them too.
customer_reviews.author: mcwriter

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, and as others have said it's great that they come fully assembled
customer_reviews.author: houtex73

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar Stool
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and comfortable bar stool. Also it seems to be heavy duty and well made. The cushion is extremely comfortable. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mojo's Beads

customer_reviews.title: Seat swivels easily up and down
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Seat swivels easily up and down. Very comfortable. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: They are well made and sturdy. I do enjoy the seat
customer_reviews.text: I found that having the cushion. They are well made and sturdy. I do enjoy the seat.

customer_reviews.title: functional and a perfect fit for our breakfast bar
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, functional and a perfect fit for our breakfast bar.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These stools are made extremely well and look great too!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. VERY well made. Great Product. Good Looking.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing stools. They are level, not cheap looking or feeling and arrive fully assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great looking barstools for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase 4 total. 1 new and 3 used very good. All looked brand new. They were already put together and easy to unbox. They are height adjustable. Love them. Great value and look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my taller kitchen bar
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my taller kitchen bar. Needed an adjustable stool. Well made and sturdy. Loved that there was no assembly needed.
customer_reviews.author: Twilight

customer_reviews.title: and looks great!! Have had many compliments on it's looks ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my bar stool, and it is exactly as advertised, and more. It is heavy duty, and looks great!! Have had many compliments on it's looks and comfort. ,
customer_reviews.author: cecilia  a  sulzbach

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: We have 8 of these in our basement bar, we ordered 6 over a year ago and loved them so much we ordered 2 more to sit beside a wine barrel. You'll love them!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stool for the price. We are very happy. Height adjustment works well and the seat is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Pelino

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: We love them! Adjustable is nice. Very sturdy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Received them early and in perfect condition. They arrived already assembled so we simply ...
customer_reviews.text: Received them early and in perfect condition. They arrived already assembled so we simply had to take them out of the box and they were ready to go. They are comfortable and well made and look perfect in the apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These stools are perfect! Love the quality, shape, weight. Very comfortable! Highly impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Tiki

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Arrived bent. Most of the screws holding seat down are missing. Ring around seat no longer aligned. And of course no phone number for customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Paffi

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stools! I ordered 4 to start out with but once they arrived I ordered 3 more. They are perfect. We always sit at the bar to eat. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: love it, love the looks and construction
customer_reviews.text: love it , love the looks and construction, if I could ask for something better is just the seating cushion, other than that it looks amazing. by the way I bought 4 of them

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made stools. They were packaged very well and required no assembly.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible stool for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome stool for the money. Comes fully assembled which is amazing and is super comfortable. Great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Great barstool
customer_reviews.text: This barstool is so nicely made, very sturdy and it was just what I was looking for

customer_reviews.title: Even better in person.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Very good looking and are as sturdy as they look. Mine fit under my pub height table so the table can be used as an island in the kitchen area. Awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ordered 2 they are great. sturdy, attractive and came fully assembled. will order another. have had any compliments.

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and strong. Works perfectly in our kitchen. I would recommend these to anyone who likes a bit of industrial or farmhouse style.

customer_reviews.text: Fabulous stool...comfortable, perfect height adjustment for counter seating. Arrived with a slight mark on seat...will try to remove with leather cleaner.

customer_reviews.title: Great construction, nice aesthetics
customer_reviews.text: Great construction, nice aesthetics. It looks a bit industrial, but not too cold. The leather top soften the metal industrial steel look of the legs and makes it comfortable to sit on for a long period of time. Great for counter height tables.
